content.metaTitle: Villa MIR0159 - Luxury 4BR Villa Jávea €2.565M | Sea Views
content.metaDescription: Stunning modern villa in Portichol, Jávea with breathtaking sea views. 4 bedrooms, 227m² on 1244m² plot. Prime Costa Blanca location. €2,565,000.
content.heroIntro:
Discover Villa MIR0159, an extraordinary modern villa positioned in the prestigious Portichol - Balcón al Mar area of Jávea, where luxury meets the Mediterranean lifestyle. This exceptional property offers four spacious bedrooms across 227m² of meticulously designed living space, all set on an impressive 1,244m² plot with breathtaking sea views that stretch to the horizon.

Crafted by renowned developer Miralbo Urbana, this €2,565,000 masterpiece represents the pinnacle of Costa Blanca luxury living. From the moment you step inside, you'll be captivated by the seamless blend of contemporary design and Mediterranean charm, with every detail carefully considered to create a sanctuary of comfort and elegance in one of Spain's most coveted coastal destinations.

locationSection.intro:
Nestled in the exclusive Portichol - Balcón al Mar area of Jávea, Villa MIR0159 enjoys one of the most coveted positions on the Costa Blanca. This prime location offers the perfect balance between tranquil residential living and easy access to Jávea's renowned beaches, upscale dining, and vibrant cultural scene. The area is renowned for its stunning natural beauty, with dramatic cliffs, crystal-clear waters, and lush Mediterranean vegetation creating a truly spectacular backdrop.

Jávea has long been considered the jewel of the Costa Blanca, attracting discerning buyers from across Europe who seek an authentic Spanish coastal experience without compromising on luxury or convenience. The town's excellent infrastructure, international community, and year-round pleasant climate make it an ideal location for both permanent residence and holiday homes, ensuring strong property values and rental potential.
highlights: Walking distance to pristine Ambolo Beach and secluded coves
15 minutes from Jávea town center with restaurants and shopping
Exclusive residential area with luxury properties and privacy
Easy access to championship golf courses and marina facilities
1 hour from Valencia Airport and Alicante Airport connections

propertyFeatures.intro: Villa MIR0159 showcases contemporary architectural excellence with its clean lines, open-plan design, and seamless indoor-outdoor living spaces. Every element has been carefully selected to maximize comfort, functionality, and the stunning sea views that define this exceptional property.
features: Four spacious bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms on the upper level
Open-plan living and dining area with floor-to-ceiling windows
State-of-the-art kitchen with premium appliances and modern finishes
Expansive terraces with panoramic Mediterranean Sea views
Private swimming pool and landscaped gardens on 1,244m² plot
High-quality materials and contemporary design throughout
Energy-efficient systems and modern climate control
Premium location in exclusive Portichol development
Designed for year-round luxury living and entertaining

content.investmentSection:
The Costa Blanca property market continues to demonstrate exceptional resilience and growth, with Jávea leading the way as one of the most sought-after destinations for international buyers. Villa MIR0159 represents an outstanding investment opportunity, combining prime location, luxury specifications, and the growing demand for high-end properties in this exclusive area. Properties in Portichol - Balcón al Mar consistently outperform the broader market due to their scarcity and desirability among affluent buyers seeking the ultimate Mediterranean lifestyle.

With Spain's Golden Visa program, excellent rental yields from the luxury holiday market, and the area's established reputation as a premier destination, this villa offers multiple pathways to investment success. The combination of Miralbo Urbana's reputation for quality construction, the property's spectacular sea views, and Jávea's continued development as an international luxury destination creates a compelling case for long-term capital appreciation and immediate enjoyment.
whyBuySection: Exclusive location in Jávea's most prestigious residential area with unparalleled sea views
Developed by Miralbo Urbana, renowned for exceptional quality and attention to detail
Prime investment opportunity in a consistently strong property market
Modern luxury villa with premium finishes and contemporary design
Large 1,244m² plot offering privacy and potential for customization
Walking distance to some of the Costa Blanca's most beautiful beaches
Excellent rental potential for luxury holiday market

faqs.question: What is the total price and are there additional costs?
faqs.answer: The villa is priced at €2,565,000. Additional costs typically include taxes (approximately 10-12%), legal fees, and registration costs. We can provide a detailed breakdown of all expenses.

faqs.question: What makes Portichol - Balcón al Mar location special?
faqs.answer: This exclusive area offers stunning sea views, proximity to pristine beaches, privacy, and is considered one of Jávea's most prestigious residential locations with excellent infrastructure and amenities.

faqs.question: What is the buying process for international buyers?
faqs.answer: We guide you through every step: property viewing, offer negotiation, legal checks, contract signing, and completion. The process typically takes 6-8 weeks with proper legal representation.

faqs.question: Can you help arrange mortgage financing?
faqs.answer: Yes, we work with Habeno mortgage specialists who can arrange financing for international buyers. Spanish banks typically offer mortgages up to 70% of property value for non-residents.

faqs.question: What is the rental potential for this property?
faqs.answer: Luxury villas in Jávea command premium rental rates, especially with sea views. Annual yields of 4-6% are achievable, with higher weekly rates during peak summer season.

faqs.question: When will the villa be completed?
faqs.answer: Please contact us for current completion timeline and construction progress updates. Miralbo Urbana maintains high standards for timely delivery.

faqs.question: What is included in the purchase price?
faqs.answer: The villa includes modern kitchen appliances, built-in wardrobes, air conditioning, and landscaping. We can provide a complete inventory of included items and optional extras.

faqs.question: Can I arrange a viewing of the property?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We can arrange virtual tours or in-person viewings. Contact us via WhatsApp or phone to schedule your visit to Villa MIR0159.

content.conclusion: Villa MIR0159 represents an extraordinary opportunity to own a piece of Mediterranean paradise in one of Spain's most exclusive coastal locations. Don't miss this chance to secure your luxury lifestyle in Jávea's prestigious Portichol - Balcón al Mar area. Contact us today via WhatsApp or call +34 634 044 970 to arrange your private viewing and begin your journey to Costa Blanca luxury living.
